rooms.description: Spacious living room with large windows and Scandinavian minimalist design elements.
Modern dining area adjacent to the kitchen for communal family gatherings.
Open-concept Scandinavian kitchen with modern appliances and ample storage.
Dedicated home theater space with soundproof walls, ambient lighting, and comfortable seating.
Guest bedroom located near the living area for easy access.

openings.description: Main entrance with Scandinavian design elements and large glass doors for natural light.
Balcony access door from each bedroom to ensure individual outdoor spaces.

rooms.description: Master bedroom with ample closet space, en-suite bathroom, and private balcony.
Second bedroom with a spacious design and adjoining balcony.
Third bedroom designed with Scandinavian aesthetics and a balcony for outdoor relaxation.
Fourth bedroom with ample space and personal balcony.

openings.description: Staircase connecting the ground and upper floors ensuring easy access.
Balcony doors leading to individual balconies for each bedroom on the upper floor.

rooms.description: Climate-controlled storage space for joint family needs, including garage and utility area.
Spacious play area for children integrated with a small garden view.

openings.description: Sub-entrance for the basement and garage area.
